column4: hey, I installed ubuntu server because i want to run a game server, but i'm a newbie so i used the command apt-get kde to install a graphical interface. after i install it, what command can i use to enter it?

also, is there a config file or something where i can edit which programs start at ubuntu? i installed mysql and apache and other stuff like that because i want to use it later, but for now i don't want them to start every time i start up the computer.
